title: Pull Out Cabinet Organizer,Adhesive with Nano Film,Slide Out Drawers Adhesive Heavy Duty Storage Drawer Shelf with 3PCS Divider Racks for Kitchen Pantry Bathroom Home,10.6"-15.7" Deep
description: Yoolookitt Pull Out Cabinet Organizer – Multifunctional Spice Bowl Drawer Storage Rack for Kitchen Base Cabinets Product Description: Transform your kitchen and bathroom storage with our premium Pull Out Cabinet Organizer. Crafted from high-quality ABS plastic and carbon steel, this organizer set is designed to bring order and efficiency to your cabinets. **Versatile 3-Size Drawer Set**  This comprehensive kit includes three uniquely sized pull-out drawers: a large drawer measuring 15.75” x 10.63” x 3.15”,  a medium drawer at 15.75” x 7.08” x 2.75”,  a small drawer at 15.75” x 3.12” x 2.75”.  Tailor your organization to fit your specific cabinet dimensions and storage requirements seamlessly. **Enhanced Storage Organization**  The Yoolookitt cabinet drawer set allows for systematic categorization and storage of your essential items, be it spices, utensils, or other kitchen necessities. By utilizing individual drawers, you can significantly minimize the risk of spills and messes. Simply pull out the drawer you need, ensuring that other items remain untouched. Enjoy the peace of mind that comes with a well-organized space. **Durable ABS Drawers & Metal Slides**  Constructed from rigid ABS plastic, these drawers provide exceptional durability, resisting deformation and rust. Additionally, the organizer features wear-resistant metal slides with built-in dampening for smooth and quiet operation, ensuring you can access your items effortlessly. **Two Convenient Installation Options**  Choose your preferred installation method: Option 1 involves using the included sturdy 3M adhesive for a quick and long-lasting attachment. Option 2 allows for further reinforcement with screws after applying the adhesive (14 screws included). Both methods have been rigorously tested for reliability. **Effortless Pull-Out Cabinet Organizer**  This innovative slide-out cabinet organizer turns cluttered spaces into organized zones. Maximize your cabinet potential, effortlessly retrieving items without the hassle of sifting through a chaotic mess. **Important Note:** Please measure your cabinet dimensions before purchase. For any measurement inquiries, feel free to reach out to us. Maintain a tidy cabinet effortlessly with our versatile 3-size combination, perfect for narrow or wide cabinets in kitchens and bathrooms alike. Experience the transformation from disorganized chaos to sleek order, enhancing your daily life with our Pull Out Cabinet Organizer. **Key Features:** - 3-drawer set in different sizes - 2 installation options - Option 1: Nano adhesive - Option 2: Adhesive and screw reinforcement
